title: RSSB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 1050 Support Engineer and Other Posts
description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 1050 Support Engineers and Support Chemist Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Civil, Mechanical, Electrical Engineering, MCA, M.Sc, B.Sc can apply for the RSSB Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Her...
